emptyState.title: No Presets

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load presets, please try again
errors.createFromTemplateFailed: Failed to create preset from template

confirm.deletePreset: Are you sure you want to delete this preset? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.cleanupDuplicates: Are you sure you want to cleanup duplicate default presets? This will delete duplicate system presets and keep the latest version.

templateSection.title: Select Template
templateSection.description: Select a preset template as a starting point, then customize the name

customNameSection.title: Custom Name
customNameSection.placeholder: Enter preset name (optional, leave blank to use template name)

customSection.title: Create Custom Preset
customSection.description: Create a brand new preset configuration, detailed parameters can be edited later

preview.title: Preset Preview
preview.description: Custom preset configuration, detailed parameters can be edited after creation

fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose and characteristics of this preset
fields.topKPlaceholder: Leave blank to use default value
fields.seedPlaceholder: Leave blank to use random seed

explanations.temperature: Lower values make output more deterministic, higher values make output more random
explanations.maxTokens: Controls AI response maximum length, recommended range: 100-63000, 0 means unlimited
explanations.topP: Controls vocabulary selection diversity, 1.0 means considering all vocabulary
explanations.frequencyPenalty: Positive values reduce repeated words, negative values increase repeated words
explanations.presencePenalty: Positive values reduce new topics, negative values encourage exploring new topics
explanations.topK: Limits the number of vocabulary considered when selecting vocabulary each time
explanations.responseFormat: Controls AI response format, JSON format is suitable for structured data
explanations.seed: Set random seed to get reproducible results

creative.name: Creative Mode
creative.description: High creativity, suitable for creative writing and brainstorming

balanced.name: Balanced Mode
balanced.description: Balanced creativity and consistency, suitable for general conversation

precise.name: Precise Mode
precise.description: Low creativity, high consistency, suitable for factual answers

concise.name: Concise Mode
concise.description: Short and concise answers, suitable for quick information retrieval

detailed.name: Detailed Mode
detailed.description: Detailed and comprehensive answers, suitable for in-depth analysis

validation.maxTokensRange: Max tokens must be between 0-63000, 0 means unlimited
validation.topPRange: Top P value must be between 0-1
validation.frequencyPenaltyRange: Frequency penalty must be between -2.0 to 2.0
validation.presencePenaltyRange: Presence penalty must be between -2.0 to 2.0

export.title: Export Data
export.description: Export all data as JSON file, including chat records, story mode messages, settings, gift records, etc.

autoBackup.title: Auto Backup Settings
autoBackup.description: Set up scheduled auto backup, will automatically remind you to backup data when the specified time arrives

import.title: Import Data
import.description: Restore all data from backup file, will overwrite current data

danger.title: Dangerous Operations
danger.description: Clear all data, this operation cannot be recovered

errors.backupFunctionNotFound: Auto backup failed: backup function not found

messages.autoBackupSuccess: Auto backup completed! File has been downloaded to your device.

confirm.autoBackupTime: Auto backup time is up! Do you want to backup data now?
confirm.clearAllData: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This operation cannot be recovered!

confirm.deleteCustomTheme: Are you sure you want to delete this custom theme?
